track.name: The Escapist
comments: still immense

Every year 'til yesterday
The same eternal setting sea
I compare all this to me
Little fleeting momentary me
these walls you'll find are yours in mind, confined not by them I
I love the impact of this song, and I think 'Everything is Borrowed' is really underrated... but honestly this track has some of the worst lyrics ever recorded. Objectively.
It's like The Shawshank Redemption, both in theme and quality.
Эта песня просто покорила меня с первого прослушивания
I love this song so much! It says so many things that I cannot.
@amantosunabimiz  : "Everything Is Borrowed" (2008).

poetry.
This song is just fucking perfect.
Incredibly marvelous.
Pretty much perfect.
always reminds me Coke Live Festival 09

Am I wrong for calling this song a fucking masterpiece? It's so good..
I want to love this song twice.
These walls were never really there, nor the ceiling, nor the chair.
yep
